resources.string: As a student or teacher, you can start a letter-writing campaign in your school to lobby governments. As an individual, you can also write or donate. Share the app and empower others to help our oceans.
The app was designed to give children a voice, teaching them about the growing tragedy of ocean pollution, and empowering them to do something about it and change fate.
Track of the Fatechanger app\'s progress and get an annual reminder to write another letter to keep up pressure to protect our waters. Follow or share ocean pollution news.
Get started on a letter-writing campaign, we\'ll show you how!
We have lots of learning material available to help you engage your students.
We need your support and donations. Learn how you can engage with Fatechanger.
Error! Unable to play youtube video!
Donations are tax-deductible and 100% of proceeds go to support saving the ocean.
Here are some examples of letters that students have written.
Look up who is the best person to write to in your country.
Write And Get The World Out
Who do I write a letter to?
To tell my government how I feel
Write a letter and spread the word.
Write your letter. Stamp, mail it, and enter it in the tracker through the map. And invite friends and family to join this very, very real battle. We can raise an army.
Watch the video about the ballot process to understand how it works.
Vote on which policy you want passed.
After kids decide, you’ll be notified. Check out the policy, then enter in the app how many signatures you plan to collect.
Download and print the signature collection paper. Begin collecting. Share.
As you collect signatures, keep them updated - see how many we need.
We can’t do this alone; we must recruit other organizations to help - kids will lead, adults will follow. Tell your local newspaper, environmenal groups, your friends!
You’ll be notified when and where to mail your signature papers.
